title: Please, Mr. Postman
lyrics:
(G)(Stop !) Oh yeah, wait a minute Mister Postman !
(Em)(Wait !) Wai-ai-ai-ait Mister Postman
 
[chorus]
(G) Mr. Postman, look and see (oh yeah)
(Em) Is there a letter in your bag for me? (Please, please, Mr. Postman)
(C) I've been waiting such a long, long time (oh yeah)
(D) Since I heard from that girl of mine!
 
(G) There must be some word today
(Em) From my girlfriend so far away
(C) Please Mr. Postman, look and see
(D) If there's a letter, a letter for me
 
(G) I've been standing here, waiting, Mr. Postman,
(Em) So-oh-oh patiently,
(C) For just a card or just a letter
(D) Saying she's returning home to me
 
[chorus]
(G) Mr. Postman, look and see (oh yeah)
(Em) Is there a letter in your bag for me? (Please, please, Mr. Postman)
(C) I've been waiting such a long, long time (oh yeah)
(D) Since I heard from that girl of mine!
 
(G) So many days you passed me by
(Em) To tears standing in my eyes
(C) You didn't stop to make me feel better
(D) By leaving me a card or a letter
 
[chorus]
(G) Mr. Postman, look and see (oh yeah)
(Em) Is there a letter in your bag for me? (Please, please, Mr. Postman)
(C) I've been waiting such a long, long time
Why donâ€™t you (D) check it and see, one more time for me!
 
You gotta (G)wait a minute, wait a minute,
(Em)Wait a minute, wait a minute (oooh-oooh)
Mr. (C)Postman, look and see
Come on and (D)leave us a letter, the sooner the better!
 
You gotta (G)wait a minute, wait a minute (oh yeah)
(Em)Wait a minute, wait a minute (oh yeah)
Mr. (C)Postman
De(D)liver the letter, the sooner the better !
(G-single strum) [end]
